mapper.select: select e.projectid,e.time,e.money,c.codename from expendincome e,code c where e.style=c.codeid
select p.id,p.projectname,o.lasttime,o.lastmoney,o.newtime,o.newmoney,o.newday from outtimetable o,projectapplication p,usertable u where o.projectid=p.id and p.userid=u.userid and u.username=#{name}
mapper.update: update outtimetable set newtime=to_date(#{0},'yyyy-MM-dd'),newday=#{1},newmoney=#{2} where projectid=#{3} and lastmoney=#{4}
